alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 11:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, Taylor and southeastern Madison Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Madison to near Perry to 17 miles east of St. Marks. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Carbur, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Townsend, Econfina, Lake Bird, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs and Sirmans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
